projectContent.text: Based on the thought benches of the Sikuani and other cultures of the Amazon-Orinoquia region, this installation proposes a scale bench to be occupied and visited. A place to think tropically is an exhibition and programming project that stages the archive of a utopian city that would be built between the Amazon and the Colombian Orinoquia in the late eighties.
